text_block_list.text: After joining the team, Narita Brian continued to show her overwhelming run to others rather than getting stable results.
After winning the “SatsukiShou”, the next event will be the “Tokyo Racetrack-Japan Derby”, a celebration of the Twinkle Series.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text: From the previous race, the voices of the triple crown have risen at an unformidable speed!! The 5th person in the history of the “Triple Crown Horse Girl”, how is your level of confidence!?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …I haven't even run a second in the Derby yet. How could I have any self-confidence or anything?

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text: The Horse Girl who didn't appear in the “SatsukiShou” will also run in the Derby. Are there any measures taken against opponents who have no history of playing against them!?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Measures? Hmph… You just have to get to the goal before anyone else.

text_block_list.name: Reporter C
text_block_list.text: Next, may I ask you a question…!

text_block_list.name: Reporter D
text_block_list.text: Ah!? Let me ask you this question first!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: There's a huge number of reporters.
That's the amount of attention they are paying her.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: 5 consecutive wins so far, 2 wins of them are G1ー The next challenge with that momentum is the “Japan Derby”.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Perhaps there is no doubt that on the day of the race, she will be the No. 1 favorite to win…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: A lot of expectations can be a big obstacle if you make a mistake. Like me once.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: On the big stage called the Derby, how to face the pressure of being the No. 1 favorite… This is the first mountain to climb.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Slope dash, please let me do it one more time!!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: That's a good suggestion, let's try it!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
text_block_list.text: The Derby is 2400m, let your body remember the pace allocation!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Yes, I understand!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: So far the atmosphere of the training course is so tense…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: After all it's the Derby, everyone is desperate to give it their all on this once-in-a-lifetime chance.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: That's not all, the guy who's been monitoring Brian's training since a while ago is rumbling!
I'm trying to take measures for those against Brian.
The tenacity of the rivals, the toughness of marking Narita Brian… And yes, winning the Derby is not easy.
That is why I was concerned about some important elements that are essential to winning the Derby.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Come to think of it Trainer-san, isn't that call coming anytime soon?
Yeah, I'll check it out. Everybody keep training.
Yeah, I'll check it out. Everybody keep training.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hey-hey, what are you talking about?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: The Derby is said to be where “the luckiest Horse Girl wins”, right? This call is to check to see if Brian has any luck.
Narita Brian is good at running ahead in a race keeping up with the previous ones. Therefore, it is important to know how much you can get to a good position without much speed loss.
And the key to that is the number and frame of the gateー
That's a lie, isn't it…?
That's a lie, isn't it…?
Frame 8 No. 17ー More also by, the largest outer frame. Luck never sided with Narita Brian…

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Finally the day has come, “Tokyo Racetrack - Japan Derby”!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Is it the No. 1 favorite Narita Brian who digs up the victory, or the rivals who have done their best for this day!?

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: You're in the best condition right now! So go run with confidence!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Yes! I will follow all the things I have worked hard to do until today!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
text_block_list.text: What matters is the start! So go win by making the most of the advantage of being in the inner frame!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Thank you for your training so far! I will make sure to win the Derby as a present to the trainer!
In contrast to the stands, the backyard is full of air.
In contrast to the stands, the backyard is full of air.
As you know, The Derby is something special for Horse Girls. Everyone has been training desperately to achieve this prosperity.
As you know, The Derby is something special for Horse Girls. Everyone has been training desperately to achieve this prosperity.
In addition, measures have been taken against you, and it got you an external frame that is said to be disadvantageous.
In addition, measures have been taken against you, and it got you an external frame that is said to be disadvantageous.
The truth is that winning is not easy…
The truth is that winning is not easy…

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: …So what?
Huh…?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: You don't need to worry about that, you just have to crush them.
With the anxiety factor, Derby's gate opened. And then, I'll be reminded againー

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: In the final corner, Narita Brian comes up from the outside! She got on the top in no time!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Crossing them!! The Goal of Victory―!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Narita Brian, double crown! 5 length difference over the “SatsukiShou”! What a Horse Girl! It was a spectacular race!
(Cheers～～!!)
No matter who you are, no matter what measures you take, no matter how lucky you are, she will win!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: That's amazing! You were not half-bad!!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Woaaah～～!! A result that surpasses everyone's expectations! A legend has been born in the Derby Again!!
choice_data_list: You always go beyond our expectations!
You always go beyond our expectations!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I don't know how you see me… but I already told you.

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: The Derby and the Triple Crown Horse Girl are both passing points.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: …This girl, she just ran 2400m. And she isn't out of breath…

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Now that you mention it…
Hahaha… Just how strong are you really…
Hahaha… Just how strong are you really…
Even myself in the position of a Trainer, it was impossible for me to hide the excitement of her bottomless ability.
